titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives supporting the Federal workforce.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives supporting the Federal workforce.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that: (1) federal employees should be applauded for their tireless work and extensive efforts on behalf of the people of the United States and recognized for the benefits they bring to the public welfare, the progress of democracy, and the United States as a whole; and (2) federal employees' salaries and benefits should not be uniquely targeted for deficit reduction.
